mapper.select: select cmpy_seq, cmpy_name from CMPY_TB where CMPY_CODE = '0000' and STATE != 'D' order by cmpy_name asc;
select cmpy_seq, cmpy_name from CMPY_TB where CMPY_CODE = '1000' and STATE != 'D' order by cmpy_name asc;
select CMPY_SEQ, CMPY_NAME, BSNS_RGNMB, CRPRT_RGNMB, RPRSN, CMPY_PHONE, ADDR, ENG_ADDR from CMPY_TB where cmpy_seq = #{cmpySeq} and STATE != 'D';

select CMPY_MNG_SEQ, CMPY_SEQ, NAME, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(ifnull(PHONE, '')) PHONE, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(ifnull(TEL, '')) TEL, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(ifnull(FAX, '')) FAX, EMAIL from CMPY_MNG_TB where CMPY_SEQ = #{cmpySeq} and STATE != 'D';
SELECT type_cd, type_name FROM COMCODE_TB WHERE use_yn = 1 AND top_cd = #{code};
select dept_seq , name from DEPT_TB where 1=1 and state != 'D' and TEST_YN = 1 order by oder
select id , mem_name from MEMBER_TB where 1=1 and state != 'D' and REV_YN = 1 and work_state = '1' and dept_seq = #{deptSeq};
select id , mem_name from MEMBER_TB where 1=1 and state != 'D' /*and REV_YN = 1*/ and work_state = '1' and dept_seq = #{deptSeq};
